      • validateRoot

        public boolean validateRoot(java.lang.String path)
        Description copied from class: VcsRootChecker
        Checks if registered mapping can be used to perform VCS operations. The difference with VcsRootChecker.isRoot(java.lang.String) is that this method should return true if unsure.
        Overrides:
        validateRoot in class VcsRootChecker

      • isVcsDir

        public boolean isVcsDir(java.lang.String dirName)
        Description copied from class: VcsRootChecker
        Checks if the given directory looks like a VCS special directory, e.g. ".git".

        This is a quick rough check. A more precise is done in VcsRootChecker.isRoot(String).
        Overrides:
        isVcsDir in class VcsRootChecker

        Overrides:

        Returns:
        Whether any descendant of VCS root can be registered as valid VCS mapping.
